mapper.select: select rnum, messageReportNo, receiver, sender,messageNo,messageReportContent ,messageReportDate FROM ( SELECT row_number() over(order by msp.messageReportNo desc) as rnum, msp.messageReportNo, ms.receiver, ms.sender, msp.messageNo, msp.messageReportContent ,msp.messageReportDate from messageReport msp , message ms where msp.messageNo=ms.messageNo) rnum where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by messageReportNo desc

select*from ( SELECT row_number() over(order by age asc) as rnum, id, name, tel, age, ( select count(*) from message where member.id = message.sender or member.id=message.receiver) as messageCount, (select sum( (select count(*) from pictureReport, memberPicture where memberPicture.pictureNo = pictureReport.pictureNo and member.id = memberPicture.id)+ (select count(*) from messageReport, message where messageReport.messageNo = message.messageNo and member.id = message.sender) )from dual)as reportCount, (select count(*) from traveler where member.id = traveler.id) as travelingCount, (select count(*) from memberPicture where member.id = memberPicture.id) as pictureCount, enabled from member ) where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by age asc
